channel.title: CVE Feed for smp7, wp.insider -- Simple Membership After Login Redirection

item.title: CVE-2024-47354|2024-10-10T18:40:37.729Z -- smp7%2C%20wp.insider -- simple%20membership%20after%20login%20redirection
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in smp7, wp.Insider Simple Membership After Login Redirection.This issue affects Simple Membership After Login Redirection: from n/a through 1.6.
